scripts.build: pnpm run ref:gen:all && pnpm run gen:sitemap && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" vocs build
scripts.gen:iframe-configurator:script: tsc components/IframeConfigurator/embedScript.ts --target esnext --module commonjs --outDir public && terser public/embedScript.js -c -o public/embedScript.js
scripts.ref:gen:demo:blog: rm -rf pages/demos/blog && mkdir -p pages/demos/blog && generate-readme-as-index-mdx ../examples/embed-demo-blog pages/demos/blog
scripts.ref:gen:demo:demo: rm -rf pages/demos/custom-integration && mkdir -p pages/demos/custom-integration && generate-readme-as-index-mdx  ../apps/demo pages/demos/custom-integration
scripts.ref:gen:demo:react-native: rm -rf pages/demos/react-native-integration && mkdir -p pages/demos/react-native-integration && generate-readme-as-index-mdx ../examples/demo-rn-expo pages/demos/react-native-integration
scripts.ref:gen:demo: pnpm run ref:gen:demo:blog && pnpm run ref:gen:demo:demo && pnpm run ref:gen:demo:react-native
scripts.ref:gen:react-editor: rm -rf pages/react-editor && mkdir -p pages/react-editor && generate-readme-as-index-mdx ../packages/react-editor pages/react-editor
scripts.ref:gen:sdk: rm -rf pages/sdk-reference && mkdir -p pages/sdk-reference && typedoc --publicPath /sdk-reference/ && add-mdx-autogen-warning pages/sdk-reference/index.mdx
scripts.ref:gen:protocol: backup-nuke-restore pages/protocol-reference "solidity-docgen -s pages -o pages/protocol-reference -i ../packages/protocol/src/ --solc-module solc -t templates/solidity-codegen" index.mdx
scripts.ref:gen:indexer: backup-nuke-restore pages/indexer-reference "pnpm run ref:gen:indexer:index && pnpm run ref:gen:indexer:openapi" custom-swagger-override.css restful.tsx
scripts.ref:gen:all: pnpm run ref:gen:protocol && pnpm run ref:gen:sdk && pnpm run ref:gen:indexer && pnpm run ref:gen:demo && pnpm run ref:gen:react-editor
